combat1.name: Normal Attack: Ceremonial Bladework
combat1.descriptionRaw:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
combat1.description:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

combat2.name: Frostgnaw
combat2.descriptionRaw: Unleashes a frigid blast, dealing Cryo DMG to opponents in front of Kaeya. Kaeya seems affable, but his nature is that of unyielding ice.
combat2.description: Unleashes a frigid blast, dealing Cryo DMG to opponents in front of Kaeya.
combat2.flavorText: Kaeya seems affable, but his nature is that of unyielding ice.

combat3.name: Glacial Waltz
combat3.descriptionRaw: Coalescing the frost in the air, Kaeya summons 3 icicles that revolve around him. These icicles will follow the character around and deal Cryo DMG to opponents in their path for the ability's duration. A winsome smile, genial words, and the merciless hoarfrost that lies beneath... These are all Kaeya's weapons.
combat3.description:
Coalescing the frost in the air, Kaeya summons 3 icicles that revolve around him.
These icicles will follow the character around and deal Cryo DMG to opponents in their path for the ability's duration.
combat3.flavorText: A winsome smile, genial words, and the merciless hoarfrost that lies beneath... These are all Kaeya's weapons.

passive1.name: Cold-Blooded Strike
passive1.descriptionRaw: Every hit with <color=#FFD780FF>Frostgnaw</color> regenerates HP for Kaeya equal to 15% of his ATK.
passive1.description: Every hit with Frostgnaw regenerates HP for Kaeya equal to 15% of his ATK.

passive2.name: Glacial Heart
passive2.descriptionRaw:
Opponents <color=#99FFFFFF>Frozen</color> by <color=#FFD780FF>Frostgnaw</color> will drop additional Elemental Particles.
Frostgnaw may only produce a maximum of 2 additional Elemental Particles per use.
passive2.description:
Opponents Frozen by Frostgnaw will drop additional Elemental Particles.
Frostgnaw may only produce a maximum of 2 additional Elemental Particles per use.

passive3.name: Hidden Strength
passive3.descriptionRaw:
Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.
